about_the_game:
This is a casual and entertaining tower defense game.

In the game, players can spend gold coins to obtain turrets and then place the turrets in appropriate positions to fend off the attacks of monsters and earn rewards.

After obtaining generous rewards, players can upgrade the level of the turrets by combining two turrets of the same level through a two-in-one method after purchasing them. They can also use the turret fragments obtained from rewards and gift packages to unlock more powerful turrets.

In the game, there is also a very cost-effective lottery system, which can help players enhance their strength more quickly.

Of course, the game also has a recycling function. Low-level turrets can be recycled to get back one-third of the gold coins spent on them.

The game also comes with features such as game acceleration and double gold coins.
